item.text: (ca) @#/ ! /sher phyin stong phrag brgya pa bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 大般若經第五部
@##// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gcig pa/
de nas byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bsko ba mdzad pas/
'di ni theg pa chen po bstan pa tsam du sems so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gam/ gcig
gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan par ma gyur lags
grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar gyur pa yang myed de/

rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar dge ba'i chos gang yang rung ste/ nyan thos kyi chos sam/ rang

sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud do/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud pa/ de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa
bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong

pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad

stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / ting nge
'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying

rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / myi mnyam pa'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms kyi rnam par spyod pa ste/

rab 'byor de dag ni dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang

chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /rab 'byor de la theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs
gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang /
myig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba gang yin pa dang / sgra gang

yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / sna'i

rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lce gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes
pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / lus gang yin pa dang / reg gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa gang

yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin

pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams gang yin pa dang /
rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin

pa dang / mying dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sred pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / srid pa gang yin pa

dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi

nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos

thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos

po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang
yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa
dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug gang yin pa dang / zil kyis

gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang yin pa dang / rgyas pa'i skye mched bcu gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang / sdug bsngal

gang yin pa dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa dang / 'gog pa gang yin pa dang / lam gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang

yin pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs kyi khams gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / myi

dge ba'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus

byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings

gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni bden
pa yang ma yin/ myi bden pa yang ma yin ste/ gzugs myed pa bstan tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs 'dis na/ khyod

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'thun par theg pa chen po ston to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang

gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de/ gnyis

su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar

myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen

po yang gzhan la/ nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang

gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / phyi stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar

na theg pa chen po dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / chen po stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed

de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg

pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang

gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan

zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed

de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang

gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su

byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen

po yang gzhan la/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan zhes

bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan

zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de

ltar na theg pa chen po dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dbang po rnams kyang gnyis

su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / stobs rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang

gzhan la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ 'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan

zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / bsam gtan rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ tshad myed pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar

na theg pa chen po dang / tshad myed pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzugs

myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gnyis su

myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu

yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / mngon

par shes pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis

su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang

gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang

gzhan la/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ so so yang dag par rig

pa rnams kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ snying rje chen po yang

gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po yang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /theg pa chen po yang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad

kyang gzhan zhes bya ba myed de/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /rab 'byor rnam grangs des na theg pa chen po bstan pas/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus su myi dmigs
te gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /
'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi'o/ /
rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bgyi ste/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /
tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu yang ma mchis myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de yang ma mchis myi dmyigs te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad du thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su
bstan par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing bstan par bgyi/
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi ba yang / bdag la mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba yang / byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la/ gang mngon
par grub pa'i gzugs lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du shes lta yang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i 'du byed
lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub
pa de ni tshor ba ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags te/

bcom ldan 'das de lta lags la mngon par ma grub pa las gud na yang / gang byang chub tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyigs su ma mchis na/ mngon par ma grub pa mngon par
ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams su mchis sam/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum yongs su myi 'jum/ 'gyod par myi 'gyur

zhing yid myi 'jigs myi dngang / skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon gyi mthar dmyigs su myed pa yin/ phyi ma'i mthar dmyigs su myed pa yin/
dbus su dmyigs su myed pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ tshor ba kun tu mtha'
yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ 'du byed
kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya ba yin/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/

'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes

bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad yang dag

par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du byang
chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ril kyis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ma dmyigs na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par

bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni mying tsam du bas so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/

de skad du ji ltar bdag bdag ces bgyi yang / bdag ni mngon par grub pa ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi yang byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par

grub pa ma mchis so/ /de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin la/ gzugs mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ chor ba mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du shes mngon par

grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ 'du byed mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis/ rnam par shes pa mngon par grub pa lta 'ang gang zhig mchis te/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang
mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du shes ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni 'du byed ma lags so/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni rnam par

shes pa ma lags so/ /zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa zhig /mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi 'am zhes smra/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na 'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba dmyigs su ma mchis so zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir

na/ de skad du gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi 'jum yongs su myi 'jum 'gyod par myi 'gyur zhing / yid myi 'jigs myi sngang skrag par myi 'gyur na/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes smra/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sems can stong pa dang / sems cad dben pa dang / sems

can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sems can myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sems can stong pa

dang / sems cad dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir na/ sems can myed pa dang / sems can stong pa
dang sems can dben pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs so/ /dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /sems can myed pa yang gzhan/ sems can stong pa yang
gzhan/ sems can dben pa yang gzhan/ sems can rang bzhin myed pa yang gzhan zhig la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhig ste/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan/ dbus kyang gzhan

zhes bya ba myed de/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sems can myed pa gang yin pa dang / sems can stong pa gang yin pa dang / sems can dben pa gang yin pa dang / sems can rang bzhin myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi
ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dben pa'i phyir

byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa dang / gzugs stong

pa nyid dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
ma yin/ gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/

dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor

ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong nyid pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi

dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub

sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi

dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la

sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo
nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon

gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes

ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'

dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir na zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid dang / 'du shes dben pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'

myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du shes myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub

sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du shes myed pa gang yin

pa dang / 'du shes stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du shes dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du shes ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'

gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub

sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i

phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs

so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems

dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du
byed myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/

sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin

pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid

myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems

dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa dben

pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par

shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/

rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang

chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa myed pa

gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi

mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig ngo bo

nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myig myed pa'i phyir byang chub

sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /myig ngo bo nyid myed pa'i

dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mye'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mye'i khams dben pa gang yin
pa dang / mye'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de

myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rlung gi khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin
pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i

nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i

khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang /
nam mkha'i khams dben pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nam mkha'i khams myed pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na nam mkha'i
khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang

chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams stong
pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i

khams ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams
stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par
shes pa'i khams myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo
nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes

pa'i khams ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dben

pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa myed pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid
myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ma rig pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa dben pa
yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang

gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid myed
pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su

byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs

so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i

dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed myed pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi
dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ 'du byed myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo
bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'du byed myed pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par
shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par
shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

so/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/
rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang

gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam
par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi
ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs

so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mying dang gzugs myed pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon
gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mying dang gzugs myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang
gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mying dang / gzugs myed pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa
dang / mying dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha'

gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched
drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug ngo bo
nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi

chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug myed pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang / skye mched drug dben pa dang /
skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye mched drug myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ skye mched drug myed pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid

gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i
mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa stong pa
nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/

dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ reg pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/

gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid myed
pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar

myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs

ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshor ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
ma yin/ tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshor ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa

myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba myed pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba ngo bo myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ skye ba myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na skye

ba myed pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang /

so/ /rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi
ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi
dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra

dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi myed pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rga shi
myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/
sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rga shi myed pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa

nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang

yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben
pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa

na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa
la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang

gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang

yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid

kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi

mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin

pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi
pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/

phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi

ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi

dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa

yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams
cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
so/ /nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ nang stong pa nyid myed
pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang

gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa

nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'

gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon

gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa

nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong

pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus

myi dmyigs te/ phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/
byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi

stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin

pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang
stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi
nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/
phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i

mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na phyi nang stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /

phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa
dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
