dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su

myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa dang / rang bzhin
stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon
gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa

dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'

gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

su myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa dang /

chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/

chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid

myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

de ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed

pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /

nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan
ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi

mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/

myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/

phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus

gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin

pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos

dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su

myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed

pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos

po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong

pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su

myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i

mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo

nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i

mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin

no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de

gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi

dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa'i phyir/

dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa la

sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang

gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma

yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa

myed do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myed pa dang /
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi

dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam
gtan myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa dben
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa myed pa dang /
tshad myed pa stong pa nyid dang / tshad myed pa dben pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ tshad myed pa myed pa
yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'
yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na tshad myed pa myed pa gang

yin pa dang / tshad myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs
so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus
su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma
yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang
yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar

myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi
dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi
dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rnam par thar pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa dben pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang

gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ rnam par thar pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa dben

pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de
thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben

pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa dang / mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma
yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /
smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang /

smon pa myed pa myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
pa dben pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs

te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa
stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus

kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad
kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa stong
pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes
pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /
mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par
shes pa myed pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa dang / mngon par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ mngon par shes pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mngon par shes
pa ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin

no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na mngon par shes pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / mngon
par shes pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang
gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa
nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin
dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ ting nge 'dzin myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa yang
gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin myed pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dben pa gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs
so/ /gzungs gyi sgo myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs

pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i
mtha' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag
pa'i mtha' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' dben

pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa yang gzhan ma
yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma

yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' myed pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i

mtha' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de

gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i
dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /

bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar

myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi

ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam

gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi
dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis

myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi

ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa

nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'

gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
nyan thos dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nyan thos myed pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi
dmyigs te/ nyan thos myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na nyan thos

myed pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'

gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir/
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /
rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ngo bo

nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas

dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ rang sangs rgyas myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid
kyang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/

phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na rang sangs rgyas myed pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang sangs

rgyas dben pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang
yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi
dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs
so/ /byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub

sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa
nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ byang chub sems dpa' myed pa
yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dben pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang
thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad
mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen
pa myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dben
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su myi dmyigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thams cad

mkhyen pa myed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo nyid myed pa la sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
myi dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thams cad mkhyen pa ngo bo
nyid myed pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa myed pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / thams cad mkhyen

pa ngo bo nyid myed pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su myed de gnyis

su byar myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dbus
su myi dmyigs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/
gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni/ sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas
pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'

yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
bu/ tshor ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun

tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/

mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du shes stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du shes kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'

yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'du byed kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par
bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i
mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par
shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' ma dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang
'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig ni nam

mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying

du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myig stong pa nyid kyi phyir myig gi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs
so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/
rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying

du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rna ba'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang

nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sna stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ sna'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par

lce ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha'
yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du lce stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ lce'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i

dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dor ba myed

pa/ stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'
'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig
par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/

mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs phyi ma'i
mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la
mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer

ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/

dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi

sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa

nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la
ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa
nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dngos po
myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs

des na/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas
pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas

pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig

par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi
dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dngos po

myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi
dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig

par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ namakha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/

mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ yang dag par spong ba kun du mtha' yas pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs dbus myi dmyigs te/
stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na yang dag par spong ba kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun
tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba

ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa stong pa
nyid kyi phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du

ci'i phyir na/ dbang po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dbang po rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam

mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du dbang po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ dbang po rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong
nyid la mtha' 'am/ dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dbang po kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang

yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang
mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus
myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ stobs rnams kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ byang chub kyi yan lag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya
zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni namakha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du
byang chub kyi yan lag stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang
yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs
so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /

gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/
mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bsam gtan rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam
mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du bsam gtan stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ bsam gtan rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te stong pa nyid la
mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas
par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ tshad myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa
sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshad myed pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus

myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du tshad myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshad myed pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na tshad myed pa kun tu mtha'
yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe
na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'

myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang
chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas

par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa
stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha'
myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi
dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par

bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig

par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/
nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i

bu/ de bzhin du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i sngon gyi
mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di

skad du ci'i phyir na/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mngon par shes pa rnams
ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha'
yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mngon par shes pa kun tu mtha'
yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu

mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha'
myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
bu/ de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus
myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na ting nge 'dzin kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di
skad du ci'i phyir na/ gzungs kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzungs kyi sgo
rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas

kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzungs
kyi sgo kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kun tu mtha' yas pa'i
phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'
zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs
phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na
nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du myi 'jigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid
la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na myi 'jigs pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha'
yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer
ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi
ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du so so yang dag
par rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am
dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ so so yang dag par rig pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par
rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ snying rje chen po ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/
dbus myi dmyigs te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du snying rje chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ snying rje
chen po'i sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
grangs des na/ snying rje chen po kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dper na/ nam mkha' la ni sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs
te/ mtha' yas kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ nam mkha' zhes mying du brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi sngon gyi mtha' myi dmyigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' myi dmyigs/ dbus myi dmyigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha' 'am dbus myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu mtha' yas par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang yang 'di skad du ci'i phyir na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes
bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed
cing myi dmyigs/ rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs shes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong
ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de

lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshor ba myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'du shes myed byang chub sems dpa' myed

do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

stong pa nyid la 'du byed myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par shes pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes

pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

stong pa nyid la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshul khrim kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed
byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/
