byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ byang chub
sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang nang stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na stong pa nyid la nang stong pa nyid myed byang chub

sems dpa' myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la phyi nang stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/

byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chen po stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /don dam pa stong

pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la don dam pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub

sems dpa' myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /chos thams cad

stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa

nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dngos po
myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par spong ba rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir
zhe na/ stong pa nyid la dbang po rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la stobs rnams myed byang chub
sems dpa' myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ byang chub
sems dpa' myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
brgyad pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'phags pa'i bden pa
rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bsam gtan rnams myed/ byang chub
sems dpa' myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni/ tshad myed pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la tshad myed pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /
gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa brgyad myed/
byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la
mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ni rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa myed/ byang chub
sems dpa' myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ mngon par shes rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la mngon par shes pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /
ting nge 'dzin rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ting nge 'dzin rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ gzungs kyi
sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ myi
'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la myi 'jigs pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig

pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /snying rje chen po ni/ snying rje chen pos stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong

pa nyid la snying rje chen po myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi dbyings myed/ byang chub sems

dpa' myed do/ /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la de bzhin nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la yang dag pa'i mtha' myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings ni/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

stong pa nyid la bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la thams cad

shes pa nyid myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid myed/ byang chub

sems dpa' myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed byang chub sems dpa' myed

do/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos kyi theg pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas

stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la

sangs rgyas kyi theg pa myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la nyan thos myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang

sangs rgyas kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la rang sangs rgyas myed/ byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa
nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa myed byang chub sems dpa' myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /tshor ba byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed byang chub sems dpa'

zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu yang myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du
bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mi dmyigs na byang chub sems dpa' ni gang zhig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang zhig la gdams shing

rjes su bstan par bya zhes zer ba ci'i phyir de skad smras shes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor
ba ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba ni 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la myed cing myi
dmyigs so/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams
la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa
la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed la myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu myig ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba ni myig la myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /myig dang rna ba ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna ni sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ sna ni myig dang rna ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig dang rna ba dang sna ni lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce
ni lce la myed cing myi dmigs so/ /lce ni myig dang rna ba dang sna la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce ni lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus ni lus la myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /lus ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus ni yid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid ni yid la myed cing myed myi dmyigs so/ /yid
ni myig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs ni sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la myed cing myi
dmyigs so/ /sgra ni gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dri ni dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dri ni gzugs dang sgra la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

gzugs dang sgra dang dri ni ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ro ni ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ro ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro ni reg la myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /reg ni reg la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /reg ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos
ni chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos ni gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg la myed cing myi dmigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

myig gi rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa la myed

cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i rnam par

shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing

myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing

myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa

ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la myed cing
myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus
te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa la
myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus
te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus
te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg

pa dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te
reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te

reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i
'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed
cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus

te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung

ba'i tshor ba ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus
te reg pa las byung ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las
byung ba'i tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya' pa/ bam po brgyad pa/ sa'i khams ni sa'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
sa'i khams ni chu'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams ni chu'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chu'i khams ni sa'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams dang /
chu'i khams ni mye'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams ni mye'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mye'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i
khams dang / chu'i khams dang mye'i khams ni rlung gi khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rlung gi khams ni sa'i khams dang /
chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni nam mkha'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nam
mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nam mkha'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la myed cing myi dmyigs
so/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par
shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams
dang / nam mkha'i khams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ni ma rig pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa ni 'du byed la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ni 'du byed
la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'du byed ni ma rig pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed ni rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par
shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa ni mying dang gzugs la myed cing myi
dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mying dang gzugs ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang /

'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs ni skye mched drug la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug ni skye mched drug la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /skye mched drug ni ma rig pa dang /

'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug ni reg pa la myed cing myi
dmyigs so/ /reg pa ni reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /reg pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang reg pa ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
tshor ba ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes

pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba ni sred pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa ni sred pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sred pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang /

rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang /
skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa ni lend pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lend pa ni lend pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lend pa ni ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes

pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang / tshor ba dang srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched

drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang / len pa ni srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa ni srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /srid pa ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang / sred pa dang len pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang mying dang gzugs
dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang / srid pa ni skye ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba ni skye ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /skye ba ni ma rig

pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang / srid pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ma rig pa dang 'du

byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang / srid pa dang skye ba ni rga shi la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi ni
rga shi la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rga shi ni ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang / len pa

dang / srid pa dang / skye ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ tshul khrims
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing
myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa

nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa
nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chen po stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa

nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid la myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myed

cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa

nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi

nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa

stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang /

phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa

stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po

stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong

pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed

pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni/ chos

thams cad stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong

pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las

'das pa stong nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang

stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs

so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong
pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa

nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid

ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus

byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams

cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha

ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la myed

cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa

nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad

stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid la myed cing myi dmigs so/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa

nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la med cing myi dmyigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid dang /

phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi

dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don

dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin

stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag

pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams

la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myed cing

myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni/ dbang po rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dbang po rnams ni

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po

rnams ni/ stobs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams ni stobs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /stobs rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang

pa dang / dbang po rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu

'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub

kyi yan lag rnams ni lam la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam ni lam la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang stobs
dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bsam gtan
rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /bsam gtan rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags

pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni tshad myed pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /tshad myed pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam
gtan rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa rnams ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan

dang / tshad myed pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la myed cing

myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par thar pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams ni mthar
kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing
myi dmyigs so/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa

rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa rnams ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams ni/ 'phags pa'i

bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams
ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni mngon par shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mngon par shes pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam

gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i
sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams ni 'phags pa'i

bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par
shes pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams ni mi 'jigs pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /myi 'jigs
pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / myi 'jigs pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed cing myi
dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / myi 'jigs pa
rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni brgyad pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ rigs kyi sa'i chos dang /
brgyad pa'i chos rnams ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs
pa'i chos rnams ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong
pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni/ rigs kyi

sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i

chos rnams ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni rigs kyi

sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos
dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams la myed

cing myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams ni/ rigs kyi sa'i chos dang / brgyad pa'i chos dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i chos rnams la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa ni rigs kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa ni brgyad pa'i sa

la myed cing mi dmyigs so/ /brgyad pa'i sa ni brgyad pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /brgyad pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang /

brgyad pa'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mthong ba'i sa ni mthong ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /mthong ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa la myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa mthong ba'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /srabs pa'i sa ni bsrabs pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /srabs pa'i sa ni so

so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa ni 'dod chags dang bral

pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong

ba'i sa dang srabs pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang srabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la myed cing mi

dmyigs so/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la myed cing mi dmyigs so/ /byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod

chags dang bral ba'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa ni/ rang

sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i

sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang mthong ba'i sa dang srabs pa'i sa dang /

'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i

sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs

pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas kyi sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa ni/ so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rigs kyi sa dang brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong ba'i sa dang / srabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang

bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

thams cad shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni thams cad

shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa la

myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ni phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir myi 'ong ba ni/ phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /phyir 'ong ba ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang

lan cig phyir 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni dgra bcom pa la myed cing myi

dmyigs so/ /dgra bcom pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa ni rang

sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa la myed

cing myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa'

ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas la myed cing
myi dmyigs so/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir myi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin
gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba

dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems
dpa' la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa
ni/ gdams shing rjes su bstan pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /gdams shing rjes su bstan pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myed cing myi dmyigs so/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar chos thams cad myed cing myi dmyigs su myed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' myed cing dmyigs su myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad
ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni

glo bur du mying du brtags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba

zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed ces bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /
mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni 'du shes ma yin/ de ni 'du byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni

mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste

myig ces bya ba dang / rna ba zhes bya ba dang / sna zhes bya ba dang / lce zhes bya ba dang / lus shes bya ba dang / yid ces bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong

gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ mig ma yin/ de ni rna ba ma yin/ de ni sna ma yin/ de ni lce ma yin/ de ni lus ma yin/ de ni yid ma yin no/ /de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang

ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba dang / sgra zhes bya ba dang / dri zhes bya ba dang / ro zhes bya ba dang / reg ces bya ba dang / chos shes bya ba'i ni glo bur du ming du brtags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni
gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ de ni sgra ma yin/ de ni dri ma yin/ de ni ro ma yin/ de ni reg

ma yin/ de ni chos ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di

ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /
lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong
gang du yang mi 'gro gang na yang mi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/

de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong

pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes

bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa

zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa
ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin

no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes

bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba zhes bya

ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni lus

kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni
mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ sa'i khams shes bya ba dang / chu'i khams

shes bya ba dang / mye'i khams shes bya ba dang / rlung gi khams shes bya ba dang / nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar

mying ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ba gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ de ni chu'i khams ma yin/ de ni mye'i khams ma yin/ de ni rlung

gi khams ma yin/ de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/

de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni/ mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba dang /

mying dang gzugs shes bya ba dang / skye mched drug ces bya ba dang / reg pa zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / sred pa zhes bya ba dang / len pa zhes bya ba dang / srid pa zhes bya ba dang / skye ba zhes bya ba dang / rga

shi zhes bya ba 'di ni/ glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ 'di ltar mying ni gang nas kyang myi 'ong gang du yang myi 'gro gang na yang myi gnas so/ /mying tsam zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin/ de ni 'du
byed ma yin/ de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin/ de ni skye mched drug ma yin/ de ni reg pa ma yin/ de ni tshor ba ma yin/ de ni sred pa ma yin/ de ni len pa ma yin/ de ni

srid pa ma yin/ de ni skye ba ma yin/ de ni rga shi ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying ni mying gi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /stong pa gang yin pa de ni mying ma yin te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste mying gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed

do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di

ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar

mying gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin
pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mying

tsam ste/ mying la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de

gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang nang stong pa nyid myed/ nang

stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di

ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ phyi stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi stong pa nyid myed/ phyi stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid

gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang phyi nang

stong pa nyid myed/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/

byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /

'di lta ste/ chen po stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang chen po stong pa nyid myed/ chen po stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa
nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/

mying la yang don dam pa stong pa nyid myed/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi

dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid myed/ 'dus byas stong

pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems

dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta

ste/ mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang

yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ thog ma dang tha

ma myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid myed/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang

yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/

de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed/ chos thams

cad stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang

chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myed/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yang

mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba

'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di

ltar mying gang yin pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /
dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid 'di ni/ mying tsam ste/ mying la yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin

pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /'di lta ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'di ni mying tsam ste/ mying la yang dngos po

myed ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed/ dngos po myed ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de

gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'

zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams myed/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi

dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du
btags pa ste/ mying la yang yang dag par spong ba rnams myed/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams

gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa

rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams myed/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/

dbang po rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang dbang po rnams myed/ dbang po rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / dbang po

rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ stobs rnams shes bya ba

'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang stobs rnams myed/ stobs rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka

yang myed cing / myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo
bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams myed/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang /

byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang mying myed

do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni
mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myed/ 'phags

pa'i bden pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang

chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang bsam gtan rnams myed/

bsam gtan rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub

sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ tshad myed pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang tshad myed pa rnams myed/ tshad myed

pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams shes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myed/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang myed cing myi dmyigs te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par

thard pa rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du mying du btags pa ste/ mying la yang rnam par thard pa rnams myed/ rnam par thard pa rnams la yang mying myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying gang yin
