zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /srid pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /srid pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi

rtog go/ /srid pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /srid pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces
bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba sdug

ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar

yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /skye ba dben zhes
bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi
stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi smon pa yod ces

bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rga shi dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag

ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag

ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan
ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam

gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba
dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong

pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang /

bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /

mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya

bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

phyi stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid sdug

ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan

ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su

myi rtog go/ /phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong

pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug ces bya

ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan

ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar

yongs su myi rtog go/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog

go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stong pa nyid
stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog

go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po
stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid
bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba
dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid smon pa yod

ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi
dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug
ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan

ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi

zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi

rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus

byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas
stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus
ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog
go/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed
ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang /
myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar

yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi
stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa

stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog
go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces

bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes
bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya

bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /
smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi
dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang /
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug

ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug
ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma
yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs
pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos
po myed pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi

rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi

rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces

bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang /

ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag

ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces

bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog

go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes
bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag
ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa
nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag
myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba dang /
myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa yod ces

bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dben zhes bya ba

dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang /

sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi

sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /
mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes
bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /
myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /dbang po rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams
bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams stong zhes bya
ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams smon pa
yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /stobs rnams dben zhes bya
ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon
pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bde
zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya
ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog
go/ /bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam
gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam
gtan rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /bsam
gtan rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa
rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed
pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa
rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog
go/ /tshad myed pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /tshad myed pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs
myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya
bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /
myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag

myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa
myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed
ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang /
myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog
go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa stong
zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma
myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya
bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang /
smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang /
myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi
sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang /
mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya
ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba dang /
myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba
dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba
dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya ba
dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang /
myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya
bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed
ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /myi 'jigs rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes
bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang /
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang
dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya
bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi
dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /

byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen
po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /byams pa chen po dben zhes bya ba
dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi
rtog go/ /snying rje chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang /
bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su
myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang /
ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid rtag
ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid bdag
ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba
dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa
yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes
bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde
zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar
yongs su myi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes
bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / myi rtag ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang /
sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / myi sdug ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / myi stong zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya bar yongs
su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / myi dben zhes bya
bar yongs su myi rtog go/ /'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos 'di dag la
de ltar yongs su rtog pa myed pa'i tshul gyis/ de ltar yongs su rtog go/ //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po
bcu bdun pa/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/
'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa
ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ myig gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig ma yin/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin/ sna'i ma skyes
pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna ma yin/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus ma yin/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin
zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin/ dri'i ma skyes pa
gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin/ ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin/ reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin zhes zer/

tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam
par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi
rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te
reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te
reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma
skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
tshor ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i
ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus
kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin
zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang
yin de ni/ chu'i khams ma yin/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mye'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams
ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes
pa'i khams ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes
pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
mying dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma
skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang
yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan rab 'byor ci'i
phyir na/ de skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ nang stong

pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa
gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog
ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes
pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos
po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes
pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes
pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa
de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad myed
pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshad myed pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes
pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ma skyes pa
gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/
mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs
kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa
gang yin pa de ni/ myi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa
chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin/ zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi
ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid ma yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin/ zhes zer/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin

pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/

tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du shes ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de
ni 'du byed ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par
shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig ni myig gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myig ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba ni rna bas stong ste/ gang stong pa
de ni rna ba ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna ni
snas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ sna ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce ni lces stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
lce ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
na/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de
ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
bu/ sgra ni sgras stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sgra ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yin no/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dri ni dris stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dri ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ro ni ros stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ro ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ro'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ro ma
yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg ni reg gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ reg
gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
bu rnam grangs des na/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi rnam par shes pa ni myig gi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang
stong pa de ni myig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myig gi
rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma
yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang
ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha
ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ni
lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma
skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi
rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma
yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig
gi 'dus te reg pa ni myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi 'dus

te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/
gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa
ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan
pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma
skyes pa gang yin pa de yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen

kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rna ba'i 'dus te
reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rna

ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam
grangs des na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lce'i
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin
te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba
ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ yid kyi
'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ sa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sa'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chu'i khams ni chu'i
khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chu'i
khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mye'i khams ni mye'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mye'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mye'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mye'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/

gang stong pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rlung gi khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nam mkha'i khams ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des
na/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nam mkha'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong
ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

rnam grangs des na/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ma rig pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba

myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas

stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang

ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mying dang gzugs ni mying dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mying dang gzugs ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

mying dang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mying dang gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye mched drug ma

yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ reg pa ni

reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshor ba ni tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

tshor ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ sred pa ni sred pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sred pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/
sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ len pa ni len pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni len pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe

dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de len pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni srid

pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/

gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rga shi ni

rga shis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam

grangs des na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims

kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin

no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang

stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa

nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin

te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chen po stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni

chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/

don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de

ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
bu/ rnam grangs des na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong

pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid

kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dor

ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ma

yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa

ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams

cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de

chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid

ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/

rnam grangs des na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed

pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba myed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ dngos po myed pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
